title: AITA: Is He An A*Hole For Being Upset About How His Wife Spends Her Money?
description:
Every week we dive DEEP into the AITA (Am I The A*hole) thread on Reddit, and it’s FASCINATING.
It’s a bunch of real-life scenarios people are in where they could EASILY be the a*hole, but maybe – just maybe – once you hear all the details, you’ll understand it a little better and they won’t be SO much of an a*hole! Or maybe not.
Up today: His wife spends her money shopping and he's not happy about it. Why? Because since he bought a car, he doesn't have money left over to spend on fund things. Does this make him an a*hole?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
